ComicInfo.Summary:
That which lurks in the shadows has a name. Spoken only in hushed whispers, tremble in fear at... Squidpump. Pru and her friends are trying to find their way in New York. The same problems we all face, demonic rituals gone wrong, stabbings, and empty fridge, and a multi-tentacle evil about to devour us all. Learning on-the-job is much more challenging with the supernatural! This series is a lead-in to the ongoing monthly Code Pru stories running in an anthology to be announced shortly! Raulo Caceres' art never looked better than in the luscious black and white of this series.
Available with Regular, Wraparound, Movie Poster, Nightlife, and a special Pure Art Incentive cover, all by series artist Raulo Caceres.

ComicInfo.Title: What's Past Is Prulogue
